headline: Can VST Gain From Surging Electricity Demand in Its Service Areas?
summary: Vistra benefits from rising electricity demand driven by data centers, LNG growth and Permian Basin electrification.

headline: CenterPoint Energy's Q2 2025 Earnings: What to Expect
summary: CenterPoint Energy will release its second-quarter earnings later this month, and analysts anticipate a double-digit bottom-line growth.
